alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Monroe; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 1:32PM EDT until July 23 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Harrison County in east central Ohio... Southwestern Jefferson County in east central Ohio... Eastern Guernsey County in east central Ohio... North central Monroe County in east central Ohio... Belmont County in east central Ohio... Northeastern Noble County in east central Ohio... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 131 PM EDT, outflow from severe thunderstorms was located along a line extending from near Cadiz to 7 miles west of Barnesville, moving southeast at 35 mph. Thunderstorms will follow the outflow across the warning area. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... St. Clairsville, Barnesville, Cadiz, Freeport, Byesville, Bethesda, Antrim, Flushing, Adena, Dillonvale, Quaker City, and Mount Pleasant. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.

area.areaDesc: Belmont; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Monroe; Noble
